name: Dungscoot
description:
Dungscoot is a first person point and click dungeon crawler where Goblins hide in closets.

Dungscoot was made within 72 hours for Ludum Dare 45.

Dungscoot is incomplete at best, but special to me because it's my first game written in pure Java and Billy's first game he's programmed for.

I hope you enjoy it!

IN DUNGSCOOT, YOU CAN:

- Toss poison at people

- Be startled by a Goblin in a closet

- Frantically click the left mouse button

- Be unfairly punished by RNG

- Fail to escape a dungeon

- Fail to escape a dungeon

- Fail to escape a dungeon

- Escape a dungeon

CONTROLS:

LMB - INTERACT/ATTACK

RMB - BLOCK

CREDITS:

Robin Field       -    Engine, Gameplay and Art.

Billy Hobson    -    Menus, Sound and Music.

PS, there is an ending to the game!
